Package src

Class Car

java.lang.Object
src.Entities.Car
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHasEngine, IMovable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Saab95, Truck, Volvo240
public abstract class Car extends Object implements IMovable, IHasEngine
Superclass Car, keeps track of a car's direction, position and speed Contains the functions of all cars, but some are overridden in sublcasses
